content.query:
create or alter PROCEDURE silver.usp_vendor
AS
begin

if object_id('silver.vendor') is not null drop  EXTERNAL table silver.vendor;

create external table silver.vendor
with (
    data_source=nyc_taxi_src,
    location='silver/vendor',
    file_format=parquet_file_format
)
AS
select * from bronze.vendor;

end
